name: tripeaks-solitaire-solver-js-73k
description: A brute force solver for tri peaks solitaire written in javascript. Forked from work by Courtney Pitcher at https://github.com/IgniparousTempest/javascript-tri-peaks-solitaire-solver

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production vite build && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --case-sensitive -o ./dist/index.html ./dist/index.html
